resources.string: This scene is completed Darling.\n\n Please go back to the map or buy exiting things from the store

Wow! You are brilliant. Game completed 
 
 
 Wait till we upload new scenarios

Welcome to PowerUp! 
 About PowerUp 
 PowerUp seeks to empower pre-adolescents to take charge of their reproductive health through this app. PowerUp teaches social, emotional learning, conflict resolution, and health skills in a fun, interactive way. 
 How to play 
 You are Rosie, a girlin her confused teens. There are 4 locations you can choose and play the situation. Everytime you select an answer you earn points depending on the option you chose. Here, we judge your deciscion making and your strength to handle critical situations.
 Superpowers - As you keep going further, you can get the superpowers that will add to your personality and make you stronger and better! 
 MiniGames - We also have mini games for you, where you can earn more points, and also get a mental break from the storyline. 
 As a Systers' Initiative This app was built through a Systers' initiative, to improve the physical and mental health trends in pre-adoloescents all over the world.
